about_the_game:
The Battlefield Hardline Ultimate Shortcut Unlock is an all-in-one bundle that includes every Battlefield Hardline Shortcut Unlock. With it, you'll get instant access to all progression weapons, gadgets, and upgrades for every class and vehicle in Battlefield Hardline. Whether you’re new to the game and want to quickly catch up to Battlefield veterans, or just want immediate access to your full arsenal, Shortcut Unlocks save you time by providing immediate access to weapons, gadgets, and other items that would otherwise be obtained through play.

Included Items:

Every Battlefield Hardline Shortcut Unlock
  • Vehicle Shortcut Unlock. Get instant access to all base-game progression upgrades for vehicles.

  • Enforcer Shortcut Unlock. Get instant access to 8 Enforcer Class weapons and 2 gadgets.
  • Mechanic Shortcut Unlock. Get instant access to 8 Mechanic Class weapons and 4 gadgets.
  • Operator Shortcut Unlock. Get instant access to 8 Operator Class weapons and 2 gadgets.
  • Professional Shortcut Unlock. Get instant access to 8 Professional Class weapons and 3 gadgets.
  • Gear Shortcut Unlock. Get instant access to all non-class specific weapons and gadgets including 5 grenades, 4 gadgets, and 2 secondary weapons.

    Note: This Shortcut Unlock does not include any Syndicate or Promotional offer weapons.
